verses.verse: Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H1085>Bildad<s%> the <S%H7747>Shuhite<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>,
<S%H575>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> wilt thou <S%H4448>speak<s%> these things? and how long shall the <S%H561>words<s%> of thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> be like a <S%H3524>strong<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%>?
Doth <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H5791>pervert<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%>? or doth the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H5791>pervert<s%> <S%H6664>justice<s%>?

If thy <S%H1121>children<s%> have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against him, and he have cast them <S%H7971>away<s%> <S%H3027>for<s%> their <S%H6588>transgression<s%>; for: Heb. in the hand of their transgression
If thou wouldest <S%H7836>seek<s%> unto <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7836>betimes<s%>, and make thy <S%H2603>supplication<s%> to the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>;

If thou wert <S%H2134>pure<s%> and <S%H3477>upright<s%>; surely now he would <S%H5782>awake<s%> for thee, and make the <S%H5116>habitation<s%> of thy <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> <S%H7999>prosperous<s%>.
Though thy <S%H7225>beginning<s%> was <S%H4705>small<s%>, yet thy latter <S%H319>end<s%> should <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H7685>increase<s%>.
For <S%H7592>enquire<s%>, I pray thee, of the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H7223><s%> <S%H1755>age<s%>, and <S%H3559>prepare<s%> thyself to the <S%H2714>search<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>:
(For we are but of <S%H8543>yesterday<s%>, and <S%H3045>know<s%> nothing, because our <S%H3117>days<s%> upon <S%H776>earth<s%> are a <S%H6738>shadow<s%>:) nothing: Heb. not
Shall not they <S%H3384>teach<s%> thee, and <S%H559>tell<s%> thee, and <S%H3318>utter<s%> <S%H4405>words<s%> out of their <S%H3820>heart<s%>?
Can the <S%H1573>rush<s%> grow <S%H1342>up<s%> without <S%H1207>mire<s%>? <S%H7685>can<s%> the <S%H260>flag<s%> <S%H7685>grow<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>?
Whilst it is yet in his <S%H3>greenness<s%>, and not cut <S%H6998>down<s%>, it <S%H3001>withereth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> any other <S%H2682>herb<s%>.
So are the <S%H734>paths<s%> of all that <S%H7911>forget<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>; and the <S%H2611>hypocrite's<s%> <S%H8615>hope<s%> shall <S%H6>perish<s%>:
Whose <S%H3689>hope<s%> shall be cut <S%H6990>off<s%>, and whose <S%H4009>trust<s%> shall be a <S%H5908>spider's<s%> <S%H1004>web<s%>. web: Heb. house
He shall <S%H8172>lean<s%> upon his <S%H1004>house<s%>, but it shall not <S%H5975>stand<s%>: he shall <S%H2388>hold<s%> it fast, but it shall not <S%H6965>endure<s%>.
He is <S%H7373>green<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, and his <S%H3127>branch<s%> shooteth <S%H3318>forth<s%> in his <S%H1593>garden<s%>.
His <S%H8328>roots<s%> are wrapped <S%H5440>about<s%> the <S%H1530>heap<s%>, and <S%H2372>seeth<s%> the <S%H1004>place<s%> of <S%H68>stones<s%>.
If he <S%H1104>destroy<s%> him from his <S%H4725>place<s%>, then it shall <S%H3584>deny<s%> him, saying, I have not <S%H7200>seen<s%> thee.
Behold, this is the <S%H4885>joy<s%> of his <S%H1870>way<s%>, and out of the <S%H6083>earth<s%> shall <S%H312>others<s%> <S%H6779>grow<s%>.

Behold, <S%H410>God<s%> will not cast <S%H3988>away<s%> a <S%H8535>perfect<s%> man, neither will he <S%H2388>help<s%> <S%H3027><s%> the evil <S%H7489>doers<s%>: help: Heb. take the ungodly by the hand
Till he <S%H4390>fill<s%> thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> with <S%H7814>laughing<s%>, and thy <S%H8193>lips<s%> with <S%H8643>rejoicing<s%>. rejoicing: Heb. shouting for joy

They that <S%H8130>hate<s%> thee shall be <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H1322>shame<s%>; and the <S%H168>dwelling<s%> place of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> shall come to <S%H369>nought<s%>. shall come: Heb. shall not be
